Draft Rating:

C

Rick Sund ranks in the 50th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. Sund's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 2 spots lower than they were picked due to their terrible drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:
  • Drafted Jeff Teague with 19th pick but was worth 11th pick.
Some of their biggest busts:
  • Drafted Johan Petro with 25th pick but was worth 55th pick.
  • Drafted Nick Collison with 12th pick but was worth 39th pick.
  • Drafted Earl Watson with 40th pick but was worth 45th pick.

Trade Rating:

S

Rick Sund ranks in the 98th percentile for trading among executives in our database.
Their biggest win:
  • Added Paccelis Morlende to OKC.
  • Lost Willie Green to PHI.
Their biggest L:
  • Added Jumaine Jones to DET.
  • Lost Bonzi Wells to POR.

Signing Rating:

C+

Rick Sund ranks in the 56th percentile for free agency signings among executives in our database.
Their best signings:

Their worst signings:
